name: mm_dedicated_search_maxping
description: Allows you to specify max acceptable matchmaking ping when searching for a game on official matchmaking servers. If there are official servers satisfying your ping setting then official matchmaking will always put you in a match hosted on those servers. If there are no official servers near you satisfying your ping setting then official matchmaking will put you in a match hosted on the next nearest official server, latency to which may exceed your ping setting.

name: ui_steam_overlay_notification_position_horz
description: Sets the horizontal offset of the Steam Community notification in the HUD

name: ui_steam_overlay_notification_position_vert
description: Sets the vertical offset of the Steam Community notification in the HUD

name: volume
description: Sets the master volume of the game

name: snd_menumap_volume
description: Sets the volume of the main menu ambiance

name: snd_spatialize_lerp
description: *0% - Physically Accurate:* Physically modeled sound panning behavior most accurately reflecting the emitter position. \n *100% - Isolated L/R:* Sound emitters that are directly to the side of the player will be hard panned with minimal blending into the opposite L/R channel. This provides a strong sense of left vs right but can be positionally misleading at certain angles to the listener. For players who prefer legacy sound panning behavior.

name: snd_voipvolume
description: Sets the volume of other players' voice chat

name: voice_threshold
description: Sets the microphone trigger threshold for voice chat

name: snd_menumusic_volume
description: Sets the volume of the main menu music

name: snd_roundstart_volume
description: Sets the volume of the round start sound

name: snd_roundaction_volume
description: Sets the volume of the round action sound

name: snd_roundend_volume
description: Sets the volume of the round end sound

name: snd_mvp_volume
description: Sets the volume of the MVP song

name: snd_mapobjective_volume
description: Sets the volume of the map objective sound

name: snd_tensecondwarning_volume
description: Sets the volume of the 10 second warning sound

name: snd_deathcamera_volume
description: Sets the volume of the death camera sound

name: snd_surf_volume_inair
description: The volume of the wind when surfing

name: snd_surf_volume_map
description: The volumme of the ambient sounds when surfing is enabled

name: snd_surf_volume_slide
description: The volume of sliding along surfaces when surfing

name: viewmodel_fov
description: Sets the field of view for the viewmodel, most people use 68 (max)
